name: Analyze texts with Google Natural Language and save the results in Google Sheets
description: This template helps you analyze texts with Google Natural Language. Then, Make will automatically save the result in Google Sheets. The template uses this [example spreadsheet](https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/13b_XyTbUCR5zxJ_9C3kDEWwI8oSx_BEPISKmuHF1s3o/edit?usp=sharing).
